entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as a person who has returned from taking Ginny upstairs and is now speaking to Harry and his friends. She looks furious and her arms are crossed.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who had not noticed Mrs. Weasley's return and is being spoken to by her.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone whom Mrs. Weasley took upstairs.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the people being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is another person being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is also one of the people being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another person being spoken to by Mrs. Weasley.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as someone who has given Harry plenty of information.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin speaks up and says 'No' to Mrs. Weasley's suggestion that Harry join the Order.

entities.name: the order
entities.description: The Order is mentioned as an organization that Harry might be inducted into if he receives more information from Sirius.

relationships.description: Mrs. Weasley speaks to Harry and his friends, telling them to go to bed.
